executable.title: BRAINSDemonWarp
executable.description: This program finds a deformation field to warp a moving image onto a fixed image. The images must be of the same signal kind, and contain an image of the same kind of object. This program uses the Thirion Demons warp software in ITK, the Insight Toolkit. Additional information is available at: http://www.nitrc.org/projects/brainsdemonwarp.
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Hans J. Johnson and Greg Harris.
executable.acknowledgements: The development of this tool was supported by funding from grants NS050568 and NS40068 from the National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke and grants MH31593, MH40856, from the National Institute of Mental Health.

parameters.label: Inputs
parameters.description: Common input parameters. All must be specified

string-enumeration.name: inputPixelType
string-enumeration.description: Input volumes will be typecast to this format: float|short|ushort|int|uchar
string-enumeration.label: Input Type

parameters.label: Outputs
parameters.description: Common output parameters. At least one must be specified.

image.name: outputVolume
image.description: Required: output resampled moving image (will have the same physical space as the fixedVolume).
image.label: Output Image Volume

transform.name: outputDeformationFieldVolume
transform.description: Output deformation field vector image (will have the same physical space as the fixedVolume).
transform.label: Output Deformation Field Volume

string-enumeration.name: outputPixelType
string-enumeration.description: outputVolume will be typecast to this format: float|short|ushort|int|uchar
string-enumeration.label: Output Type

string-enumeration.name: interpolationMode
string-enumeration.label: Interpolation Mode
string-enumeration.description: Type of interpolation to be used when applying transform to moving volume. Options are Linear, NearestNeighbor, BSpline, or WindowedSinc

parameters.label: Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Input parameters controlling the behavior of the demons registration.
parameters.string-enumeration: registrationFilterType registrationFilterType Registration Filter Type: Demons|FastSymmetricForces|Diffeomorphic|LogDemons|SymmetricLogDemons Registration Filter Type Diffeomorphic Demons FastSymmetricForces Diffeomorphic LogDemons SymmetricLogDemons:

double.name: smoothDeformationFieldSigma
double.label: Deformation field smoothing sigma
double.description: A gaussian smoothing value to be applied to the deformation feild at each iteration.

integer.name: numberOfPyramidLevels
integer.label: Pyramid Levels
integer.description: Number of image pyramid levels to use in the multi-resolution registration.

integer-vector.name: minimumFixedPyramid
integer-vector.description: The shrink factor for the first level of the fixed image pyramid. (i.e. start at 1/16 scale, then 1/8, then 1/4, then 1/2, and finally full scale)
integer-vector.label: Moving Shrink Factors

integer-vector.name: minimumMovingPyramid
integer-vector.label: Moving Shrink Factors
integer-vector.description: The shrink factor for the first level of the moving image pyramid. (i.e. start at 1/16 scale, then 1/8, then 1/4, then 1/2, and finally full scale)

integer-vector.name: arrayOfPyramidLevelIterations
integer-vector.description: The number of iterations for each pyramid level
integer-vector.label: the iteration count for each pyramid level

parameters.label: Input image pre-processing options
parameters.description: Operations to perform on the images before starting the registration.

boolean.name: histogramMatch
boolean.description: Histogram Match the input images. This is suitable for images of the same modality that may have different absolute scales, but the same overall intensity profile.
boolean.label: Histogram Match

integer.name: numberOfHistogramBins
integer.label: Number of histogram bins to use in histogramMatch

integer.name: numberOfMatchPoints
integer.description: The number of match points for histrogramMatch
integer.label: Number of Match Points

integer-vector.name: medianFilterSize
integer-vector.label: Median Filter Size
integer-vector.description: Median filter radius in all 3 directions. When images have a lot of salt and pepper noise, this step can improve the registration.

parameters.label: Deformation field initialziation
parameters.description: Options for initializing the deformation field.

transform.name: initializeWithDeformationField
transform.description: Initial deformation field vector image file name
transform.label: Initial Deformation Field Volume

parameters.label: Mask Options
parameters.description: Options for setting binary masks for the registration.
parameters.string-enumeration: maskProcessingMode maskProcessingMode What mode to use for using the masks: NOMASK|ROIAUTO|ROI|BOBF. If ROIAUTO is choosen, then the mask is implicitly defined using a otsu forground and hole filling algorithm. Where the Region Of Interest mode uses the masks to define what parts of the image should be used for computing the deformation field. Brain Only Background Fill uses the masks to pre-process the input images by clipping and filling in the background with a predefined value. Mask Processing Mode NOMASK NOMASK ROIAUTO ROI BOBF:

image.name: fixedBinaryVolume
image.description: Mask filename for desired region of interest in the Fixed image.
image.label: Input Fixed Mask Filename

image.name: movingBinaryVolume
image.description: Mask filename for desired region of interest in the Moving image.
image.label: Input Moving Mask Filename

integer.name: backgroundFillValue
integer.description: Replacement value to overwrite background when performing BOBF
integer.label: BOBF Background Replacement Value

integer-vector.name: seedForBOBF
integer-vector.description: coordinates in all 3 directions for Seed when performing BOBF
integer-vector.label: Seed For BOBF

integer-vector.name: neighborhoodForBOBF
integer-vector.description: neighborhood in all 3 directions to be included when performing BOBF
integer-vector.label: Seed For BOBF

parameters.label: Advanced Options
parameters.description: Uncommon debugging or other advanced options.

string.name: outputDisplacementFieldPrefix
string.label: Component displacement field prefix
string.description: Displacement field filename prefix for writing separate x, y, and z component images

image.name: outputCheckerboardVolume
image.description: Genete a checkerboard image volume between the fixedVolume and the deformed movingVolume.
image.label: Output Checkerboard Volume

integer-vector.name: checkerboardPatternSubdivisions
integer-vector.description: Number of Checkerboard subdivisions in all 3 directions
integer-vector.label: Checkerboard Pattern Subdivisions

boolean.name: outputNormalized
boolean.description: Flag to warp and write the normalized images to output. In normalized images the image values are fit-scaled to be between 0 and the maximum storage type value.
boolean.label: Warp Normalized Images

boolean.name: outputDebug
boolean.description: Flag to write debugging images after each step.
boolean.label: Write Intermediate Images

integer-enumeration.name: gradientType
integer-enumeration.description: Type of gradient used for computing the demons force (0 is symmetrized, 1 is fixed image, 2 is moving image)
integer-enumeration.label: Gradient Type

double.name: smoothingUp
double.description: Smoothing sigma for the update field at each iteration
double.label: Update field smoothing

double.name: maxStepLength
double.description: Maximum length of an update vector (0: no restriction)
double.label: Max Step Length

boolean.name: UseDebugImageViewer
boolean.description: Display intermediate image volumes for debugging

boolean.name: PromptAfterImageSend
boolean.description: Prompt the user to hit enter each time an image is sent to the DebugImageViewer

integer.name: numberOfBCHApproximationTerms
integer.description: Number of terms in the BCH expansion
